website_summaries.verdict: Leaving hair healthy and shiny, this shampoo is a perfect fit for those suffering with psoriasis.
pros: We love that this shampoo came with different lids, so you could chose if you want to pump or pour the product
Provides effect relief of psoriasis and dandruff symptoms
Scent is quite strong, but relaxing
We also noticed a significant difference in the look and feel of our hair
Makes hair shiny, thick, and full after just a few uses
cons: The tingle sensation is rather weak compared to other brands

website_summaries.verdict: Safe for all ages, this alcohol-, paraben-, and sulfate-free shampoo is designed to stop flakes and itching from dandruff while soothing the scalp.
pros: All types and textures of hair smell clean and feel soft after use
Some psoriasis sufferers get better results than with more expensive prescription shampoos
Those with dandruff report fewer flakes and less itching within a week
cons: Some find the odor too strong while using the shampoo, although the smell dissipates after rinsing it out
